text: Ani jevha amhi isra'ilacya putrankaduna vacana ghetale ki tumhi allahacya sivaya dusarya konacihi bhakti-upasana karu naka ani a'i-bapasi cangale vartana rakha ani tyacapramane javalace nateva'ika, anatha ani gariba lokansi sadâ€Œvyavahara kara ani lokanna cangalya- bhalya gosti sanga. Namaja kayama kara ani jakata (kartavya dana) deta raha. Parantu kahi loka vagalata, tumhi sarva mukarale ani tonda phiravile
